title._content: [Major General John White Geary of 28th Pennsylvania Infantry Regiment and General Staff U.S. Volunteers Infantry Regiment in Civil War battle pin]  (LOC)

description._content: [Major General John White Geary of 28th Pennsylvania Infantry Regiment and General Staff U.S. Volunteers Infantry Regiment in Civil War battle pin] [between 1863 and 1865] 1 photograph : tintype ; 12.5 x 11 cm (frame) Notes: Title devised by Library staff. Frame: Berg, no. 7-42; vintage frame provided by donor. Identified by Brendan Synnamon, November 2011. Use digital images. Original served only by appointment because material requires special handling. For more information see: (www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html) Photograph of identified general is mounted within shield-shaped medal that lists names of battles in which he fought on the border: Williamsburg, Fair Oaks, Mechanicsville, Gaines Mill, Chancellorsville, Savage Station, Charles City Crossroads, Malvern Hill, South Mountain, and Antietam. Gift; Tom Liljenquist; 2011; (DLC/PP-2012:127). Purchased from: Regimental Headquarters, Falmouth, Va., 2011. Forms part of: Liljenquist Family Collection of Civil War Photographs (Library of Congress). Subjects: Geary, John White,--1819-1873--Military service. United States.--Army.--Pennsylvania Infantry Regiment, 28th (1861-1865)--People. Generals--Union--1860-1870. United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Military personnel--Union. Format: Medals--1860-1870. Portrait photographs--1860-1870. Tintypes--1860-1870. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Ambrotype/Tintype filing series (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650518 Liljenquist Family collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 2010650519 More information about this collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.lilj Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ppmsca.31316 Call Number: AMB/TIN no. 2690
